articles.author: Oscar Holland
articles.title: Rihanna, Mark Zuckerberg and Ivanka Trump among bevy of stars at Indian billionaire heir’s pre-wedding bash - CNN
articles.description: The three-day celebrations, hosted by Asia’s richest man Mukesh Ambani, welcomed around 1,200 guests from Silicon Valley, Bollywood and beyond.
articles.content: Mark Zuckerberg, Bill Gates and Ivanka Trump were among the high-profile international figures who jetted to India for billionaire heir Anant Ambanis extravagant pre-wedding party, which wrapped up S… [+1854 chars]
